name: Super Horse Adventure
description:
Super Horse Adventure

created by don boody, all music/SFX by Tim Crowe

*Optimized for CHROME browser*

Keyboard controls:
  • Start Game/Confirm character selection = A (click inside game window first)
  • Restart Demo = ESC
  • Move left/right = Arrows
  • Jump = Up Arrow or A
  • Fire = D (REQUIRES HORSEY APPLESEED POWER-UP)
Xbox360 controller:
  • Start Game/Confirm character selection = A
  • Restart Demo = Start
  • Move left/right = LEFT ANALOG STICK
  • Jump = A
  • Fire = X (REQUIRES HORSEY APPLESEED POWER-UP)
Toggle fullscreen with space bar.
